name: DiffMatchPatch-ObjC
summary: DiffMatchPatch-ObjC is a small library for diffing text.
description:
This is an Objective-C port (with a C interface) of the [Diff, Match and Patch](http://code.google.com/p/google-diff-match-patch/) library.
                   It's a rather enthusiastic refactoring of Jan Wei√ü's <https://github.com/JanX2/google-diff-match-patch-Objective-C>.
